title: rachael9385
author: rachael9385
content: My fellow Nigerians una good day SIRs and MAs, I come with one matter way they worry all the students for 9ja, this matter don rise but e com worst as this man way them they call am JAGABAN become the president.The thing be say school fees done increase to the level way be say some students way their parents no get money, them done quit school because no money to afford the school fees.As I never see any discussion about this school fees matter nai make me raise the alarm, because plenty of us nah 9ja students, abi we no hear say 2 days ago protest happen for the university of LAG (Lagos State University)? This one nah the unilag protest link, and the worst part of the matter be say even the police men beat up students.Students they vex how this man go just come one day increase school fees reach the amount of money way e reach to buy some piece of land for some local areas, abi e good like that?

comments.author: Adams0001
comments.body: Dis matter no be small one oo. The school fees price hike go really affect dem d students wey dey school most especially d parents wey dey pay their school fees. With dis kind harsh economy, to increase school fees prove an d wrong tin to do now. Dem dey talk about palliatives everyday bcos of dis fuel hike, instead wey dem go share money or food for d masses, wey we know say most people go steal am go house wey dey in charge. E beta make dem subsidise d price of all dis school fees for d parents to also feel relieve. Naija, our country just dey wan kind state wey person no fit explain again. Make all dis hardship wey we dey face just turn enjoyment for us later na im b d prayers now.

comments.author: Antotena
comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on September 09, 2023, 03:42:31 PMMy fellow Nigerians una good day SIRs and MAs, I come with one matter way they worry all the students for 9ja, this matter don rise but e com worst as this man way them they call am JAGABAN become the president.The thing be say school fees done increase to the level way be say some students way their parents no get money, them done quit school because no money to afford the school fees.As I never see any discussion about this school fees matter nai make me raise the alarm, because plenty of us nah 9ja students, abi we no hear say 2 days ago protest happen for the university of LAG (Lagos State University)? This one nah the unilag protest link, and the worst part of the matter be say even the police men beat up students.Students they vex how this man go just come one day increase school fees reach the amount of money way e reach to buy some piece of land for some local areas, abi e good like that? There is economy hardship everywhere but you see the reality of this, people will still pay even if they protest from now to tomorrow because protest hardly bring leaders to succumb anytime people complain in this country. Na the koko wey dy happen for Naija be this because I remember then when we sef go protest for school make things better only for some snitch to go do another thing behind out back.Make we check mate this increase school fees wey dy propose and the economy. Things are hard everywhere and everything don cost, the cost of maintenance and new projects, to be able to meet up with the standard of things, they have to really increase the fees because make I no lie you, government no too send education for this country, na one of the reason why ASUU dy fight for student even if we know say them say get for body.But I know sure if this is proposed or already finalized amount. I don't know for other universities because my school then, when the school propose a school fees, the SUG will review what the senate bring to the table, they will come back and do their own meeting and then come as one and give their own stand and go back to the senate again. They will continue to deliberate on the price until they reach on agreed price that will be suitable for everyone and if the school don't want to be considerate, then SUG has the right to protest under the supervision of police and civil defense to avoid hoodlums from hijacking and turning it to riot. The school will have to agree with the SUG but I'm not sure if the same is happening in Uni Lag.

comments.author: Smartgoat
comments.body: this matter done tire me well well. everything in this new government just dey go left Left. nothing wah this government done do, wah favor the citizens. from the first day wah they come, plenty this done go wrong already. since things are hard in the country, we're can some parents see such amount of money to pay there children school feels. already, one of my friend done tell me say him wah withdraw from school for now. e get something wah me been talk before, I say may our country no miss our before PRESIDO BUBU. and now we are missing him already.I come dey ask our country people, which way forward.

comments.author: Odohu
comments.body: This does not really come as a surprise to me because the price of everything in the country have increased following the poorly planned subsidy removal. While I see the increase in school as outrageous, there was need to actually adjust the school fees if the school are to meet up with running the system. What I rather find so strange is Federal schools increasing school fees to multiples of what it used to be considering the fact that they are being funded by the government and the staff under the payroll of the government. Well, I will not forget that everyone is looking for a way to take advantage of the systems since our institutions, that are supposed to checkmated them, are practically sleeping. At this price, there is little difference between public schools and private schools and if you ask me, I prefer the later considering the infrastructures and learning environment that is like world apart.

comments.body: For that same Lagos state, na im dem dey harass and beat up voters wey don see the thing wey dis Tinubu go do because dem wan vote against him. Yes many Muslim feel say instead wey Christian go become president say make Tinubu dey there and dem rig him enter, today na who the thing affect go dey bear am. Tinubu na tax wey him sabi, na to increase standard of living and not to improve it na him im sabi. Shabi him be governor during Obasanjo when dem two get problem and obj seize Lagos state allowance, no be IGR him take rule? Agbero begin full everywhere for Lagos. Omo na to wait for supreme court or next election to see if remedy go come. Bag of rice now don dey fly like Ethiopian airline.

comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on September 09, 2023, 03:42:31 PMMy fellow Nigerians una good day SIRs and MAs, I come with one matter way they worry all the students for 9ja, this matter don rise but e com worst as this man way them they call am JAGABAN become the president.The thing be say school fees done increase to the level way be say some students way their parents no get money, them done quit school because no money to afford the school fees.Reason dey for this increase but I understand where the anger dey come from because assuming say work dey and dey increase this school fees students no go para much because dem fit work work wey go pay them well and them go pay their school fees by demselfs but work self no dey and the point of the increase no come make sense. Shey una dey see how much wey private sectors dem dey pay for school fees compared to wetin the government school dem dey pay and make we no forget say government dey carry too much load for their head wey dem need release because the government for the country no dey work. Assuming the government dey work, all this wahala no for dey happen. These universities dey generate so much revenue wey dem supposed fit dey handle demselfs but still dey dey depend on the government support. Quote from: rachael9385 on September 09, 2023, 03:42:31 PMand the worst part of the matter be say even the police men beat up students.Students they vex how this man go just come one day increase school fees reach the amount of money way e reach to buy some piece of land for some local areas, abi e good like that? Leave the police matta dat one na another topics on e own because our uniform men for this country dey fuck up but this protest sumthin, we too dey overdo. We know say we dey country wey law no dey yet we go dey overdo the protest thing and dey give this men reason to dey abuse us. The way I dey see this thing na say government wan commot hand for everything wey make the school ey generate funds to handle demselfs because weda we like am or not education is now becoming a business in the country and dem dey find way wey e go dey profitable. Me I no like the increase but if we really want change for the country, we need to dey try other alternative dem and not doing exactly what we have been doing before and yet we dey expect the change wey we dey cry about, the increase sha too big make I no lie.

comments.author: Sim_card
comments.body: These rich men and politicians are threat to the poor people in Nigeria because they are worsening the situation of things in the country so that the poor man wouldn't be able to survive through the hardship and might not be able to train their children by giving them quality education. i have sat down and thought of it when Tinubu said that there will be removal of subsidy from school fees, this one make me para weller because na only school fit give poor man the opportunity to mingle with rich men and to also dey big office like rich men children. Now wey Tinubu don carry him own plans come to make the poor ones strive to live, imagine before poor man dey fit eat three two times but now na government won begin give poor people money to take survive wey no go reach them spend for three days. It sucks that the country is too big for these old cargos to lead due to their inefficiency lessen the hardship in the country.

comments.author: Charles-Tim
comments.body: Quote from: CryptopreneurBrainboss on September 10, 2023, 12:08:06 PMThese universities dey generate so much revenue wey dem supposed fit dey handle demselfs but still dey dey depend on the government support.This is what the federal government wants to work towards, for universities to be able to generate money for themselves internally, or in a way the pressure on the federal government would be reduced. UNILAG is a federal government university and the fee they pay is far much more cheaper than state government schools. Despite that state government schools depends on state government, federal government students pay the lowest fee in the country. There is no way they will not depend on the federal government. The schools that I know that are less dependent are paying high amount of money. I remember Lautech that went on a strike for a long time, they resumed for exam. After they finished the exam, the strike continued until the tuition fee was increased. That was many years ago. I do not know much about the school anymore. Nigeria has one of the Universities that has one of the lowest tuition fee in the world, in a way that some tertiary schools in some states are free, while federal government universities are paying low amount in fee, followed by the state owned universities. The private schools are more expensive. Maybe it would have been better in a way that those that go to school may easily get job if the school fee is normal like other countries.

E too bad nah, and now way school fees con increase self, e con dey give plenty students double thought whader them go quit or them go continue because no money to pay school fees and even if them go the school finish no better job for them.But as a naija way we be anyhow way the government run am we as a Nigerians we go survive.For some countries as a student way dey go school, you still fit dey work, but for naija no be so, the government done Tite every Conner so that students go suffer and still them increase the school fees.

comments.body: Obob this matter get as e be. The school fees high well well and e nor make sense to increase school fees for this kind time wey the economy dey dance makosa. Government nor try for this one because na only them dey say them dey do one or two to make things easy for local man make the fuel subsidy wey them comot nor finish man but them still dey increase school fees. How them expect people to fit take afford am? Even the student loans wey them dey plan to start sef nor easy to get. I no go advice the students to protest, cos protest no dey go anywhere….make them reason with the school management to allow students write exam without paying school fees till clearance time.

comments.body: I no even know where this country is leading us to because to be sincere this is getting out of hand, e come mean say people wey no get money no go fit afford school fee again then wetting be the work of government and why are they in that office and why is the school fee of Federal University be high like this?Although for northern side, the school fee never high like that but 200k Naira is much for undergraduate, the funny part is that even after the school, no guarantee job they outside they wait for u.I have been experiencing bad government for a while but this administration is getting out of control, food, shelter, social amenities and other things we need are expensive and the government is not supporting again; insecurity come join them again ”For this country now, the cost of living wan kill the living”

comments.body: Quote from: rachael9385 on September 09, 2023, 03:42:31 PMMy fellow Nigerians una good day SIRs and MAs, I come with one matter way they worry all the students for 9ja, this matter don rise but e com worst as this man way them they call am JAGABAN become the president.The thing be say school fees done increase to the level way be say some students way their parents no get money, them done quit school because no money to afford the school fees.As I never see any discussion about this school fees matter nai make me raise the alarm, because plenty of us nah 9ja students, abi we no hear say 2 days ago protest happen for the university of LAG (Lagos State University)? This one nah the unilag protest link, and the worst part of the matter be say even the police men beat up students.Students they vex how this man go just come one day increase school fees reach the amount of money way e reach to buy some piece of land for some local areas, abi e good like that? I feel that the increment is School fee isn't completely the government fault as the governing council of the university are the people who actually determine the school fee. Based on our knowledge about subsidy, it is a direct or indirect payment from the government.Assuming the government pays 70% as subsidy for a school fee of #150,000 (that is the government pays #105,000 out of #150,000) removal of subsidy means we have to pay the full #150,000 but if the governing council of the university decides to increase the fee from #150,000 to #300,000, students will be left in the dark and assume that this increment was as a result of the removal of subsidy not knowing that the governing council of the university as a hand in it
